meanings.definition: The part of a flower that contains the female reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The gynaecea of the flower is where the seeds are formed.
meanings.sent2: Bees help in pollinating the gynaecea of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The gynaecea of the flower blushed when the bee came near.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like the gynaecea of a flower.
meanings.sent5: The delicate gynaecea holds the future of the plant.

meanings.definition: A group of women living together in a household.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient village, the gynaecea shared chores and stories.
meanings.sent2: The gynaecea in the house always supported each other.
meanings.sent3: The gynaecea decided to have a pajama party to relax.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was as strong as the roots of a gynaecea.
meanings.sent5: The laughter echoed through the gynaecea of the home.
